mapper.select: select tbl_contents.Category_ID categoryID,tbl_contents.Contents_ID contentsID,tbl_contents.Contents_Title title, tbl_contents.Contents_Location location, tbl_contents.Contents_Rating rating, tbl_contents.Contents_View_Cnt contentsViewCnt, tbl_contents.Contents_Review_Cnt contentsReviewCnt, tbl_contents.Contents_Scrap_Cnt contentsScrapCnt, tbl_contents_detail.Contents_Contents contents, tbl_contents_detail.Contents_Time time, tbl_contents_detail.Contents_Tel tel from tbl_contents NATURAL JOIN tbl_contents_detail

select Category_ID categoryID, Contents_ID contentsID, Contents_Title title, Contents_Location location, Contents_Rating rating, Contents_View_Cnt contentsViewCnt, Contents_Review_Cnt contentsReviewCnt, Contents_Scrap_Cnt contentsScrapCnt from tbl_contents where Contents_ID > 0 order by Contents_ID desc limit #{startNum}, #{contentsPerPage}
select count(Contents_ID) from tbl_contents where Contents_ID > 0
mapper.update: update tbl_contents set Contents_View_Cnt = Contents_View_Cnt + 1 where Contents_ID = #{contentsID}
